ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would recommend this course to other students. Thi course may let you have a deep understanding about Zuozhuan and its narrative.

It is a must-do course for those who are interested in early China history and literature. It offers a good training for those who want to pursue an academic career in the field of Chinese history and literature.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course lets me know how to read ancient Chinese literatures, I form a good habit of studying.

It offered me a great chance to read into the primary texts. A lot of passages from Zuozhuan and Shiji we read in class are very interesting, but are usually ignored. I have found some particular texts that might be useful for my future studies.
